#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Manchester United bests Ajax to win Europa league
#Text=Friday , May 26 , 2017

#Text=On Wednesday , in the UEFA Europa League final , Manchester United defeated Dutch capital -club Ajax AFC 0 – 2 to win the Europa League title and qualify for the UEFA Champions League group stage despite finishing sixth in the Premier League this season .

#Text=A deflected goal from Paul Pogba 's left-footed shot in the first half and a flick goal by Henrikh Mkhitaryan in the second half ensured that José Mourinho 's side lifts its third trophy in this season , previously winning Community Shield and the EFL Cup .
#Text=Before the kick-off , a one-minute silence was observed at the Friends Arena , Stockholm , for the victims of a suicide attack in Manchester Arena on Monday .
#Text=The English side had just 33 % ball possession in the entire match , completing 192 passes out of 276 .
#Text=A comparatively young Ajax team , with the average age of the starting lineup no more than 23 years , had 88 % passing accuracy , with 565 successful passes .
#Text=Manchester United had better numbers for defense , recovering 64 balls – 22 more than Ajax , and had almost twice as many ball clearances as the Dutch counterpart .
#Text=A total of 32 fouls were committed in the match , and the official booked six players – three players of each side received a yellow card .

#Text=At the age of 17 years and 285 days , Ajax 's Matthijs de Ligt became the youngest player to play in the Europa League final , while Marcus Rashford became the youngest winner of the tournament at the age of 19 years and 205 days .
#Text=A deflection off Davinson Sánchez from Paul Pogba 's left-footed shot gave United an early lead .
#Text=Ajax 's shot-stopper saved Antonio Valencia 's close-range strike .
#Text=Another attempt in the first half by Ajax 's Bertrand Traoré was saved by Sergio Romero .
#Text=The half time ended 0 – 1 .
#Text=Minutes into the second half , Armenian midfielder Mkhitaryan scored a goal just in front of Ajax 's net , which doubled Manchester 's lead .
#Text=Five players were booked in the second half .
#Text=Ajax 's attempts in the final minutes of the game were stopped by Romero , not giving them a chance to reduce the difference .
#Text=Last season , Premier League club Liverpool FC lost the Europa finals against Spanish side Sevilla FC .
#Text=United is the first English club to win the Europa since 2013 .
#Text=This season 's Premier League winners Chelsea won the tournament four years ago against Benfica at Ajax 's ground , Amsterdam ArenA .
#Text=Since then , Sevilla has added three Europa titles to their collection .
#Text=After the match , Ajax 's coach Peter Bosz said , " We 're obviously disappointed .
